sourcesContent: import "./Input.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' export default function Input() { function sub() { axios .post('http://localhost:4000/api/workouts', { title: document.getElementById('title').value, author: document.getElementById('author').value, blog: document.getElementById('blog').value, }) .then(response => { console.log(response.data); }) .catch(function (error) { console.error(error); }) } return (
